scripts.build-all: electron-packager ./ TextIsland --platform='all' --arch='ia32,x64,arm64' --overwrite --build-version=0.1.0 --out=dist --icon='./resources/other/icon.ico' --win32metadata.CompanyName='Sv443 Network' --win32metadata.ProductName='Text Island' --win32metadata.FileDescription='A text-based adventure game' --win32metadata.requested-execution-level=asInvoker --darwin-dark-mode-support
scripts.build-win: electron-packager ./ TextIsland --platform='win32' --arch='ia32,x64' --overwrite --build-version=0.1.0 --out=dist --icon='./resources/other/icon.ico' --win32metadata.CompanyName='Sv443 Network' --win32metadata.ProductName='Text Island' --win32metadata.FileDescription='A text-based adventure game' --win32metadata.requested-execution-level=asInvoker
